faq0.question: How can Arrowster's mentors support me?
faq0.answer_1: We support students throughout every stage of the study abroad journey — from planning to paperwork.
faq0.answer_2: ✨ Before applying: You’ll receive a clear step-by-step roadmap, explore majors and careers that fit you, and join exclusive skill-building workshops designed just for Arrowster mentees.
faq0.answer_3: 📄 When it’s time to apply: Our mentors will help you build a personalized school list through tailored reviews, guide you through extracurricular planning and scholarship applications, and connect you with a 1-on-1 counselor for private chats and weekly video calls. You’ll also get access to a premium resource library and an AI assistant to help you brainstorm, write, and refine your application essays.
faq0.answer_4: ✈️ After applying: We’ll continue to support you with visa guidance, financial proof paperwork, and help you manage multiple school offers.
faq0.more: Learn more about our mentorship program

faq1.question: What countries can Arrowster support me in applying to?
faq1.answer: We help students apply to US, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom, and Europe (incl. countries such as France, Netherlands, Germany, etc). In Vietnam, we also help students apply to RMIT and BUV.

faq2.question: What are partner schools?
faq2.answer: These are schools we partner with - this means we can help students secure higher admission rates and exclusive scholarships. Since partner universities provide Arrowster with a commission upon successful enrollment, we only require a refundable deposit from students to ensure commitment.

faq3.question: What schools do you partner with?
faq3.answer: We partner with top institutions in the world, including all schools in Australia & UK (except Oxford & Cambridge), Top 10 Universities in Canada, Top 50-150 Universities in US, Applied Science Universities in Europe, and more. View our partner school lists here.

faq4.question: Who are my mentors?
faq4.answer: You’ll work with mentors who have studied abroad and won scholarships at best universities such as Harvard University, Yonsei University, University of Pennsylvania, etc. We also connect students with experts in their majors to learn about their careers.

faq5.question: Will I work with you online or offline?
faq5.answer: For most students, we will work online via messages and online meetings. If needed, you can come meet us at our beautiful office in District 1, Ho Chi Minh City!
